id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for this [LD2450 Sensor component.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [UART Component](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart) to use. Required if you have multiple UARTs configured.

*See also: [Component](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2450.html#configuration-variables)*
